name: MaDa_CloneHachal
oralText: Hmmm, no. This is no good. I need more information. I wish someone could help me.
introText: Madrigal holds much history, and many secrets, some of which should stay hidden. Don't go sticking your nose where it doesn't belong if you know what's good for ya'.
byeText: Be careful out there. Watch your step!

links.title: Who are you?
texts: I am Hachal Gedvas. I was kicked out of the Madrigal History Society. Now I roam the Plain of Bubble in search of Madrigals many secrets.

links.title: Goodbye!
texts: Be careful out there. Watch your step!
